svg.text: Week in Ethereum News - August 17 2024
August 17 2024

title: "Week in Ethereum News
August 17, 2024" date: "2024-08-17"
Eth News and Links
All core devs
â€¢ All Core Devs - Execution (ACDE) #194 : Pectra (Prague + Electra) upgrade : Pectra-devnet-3 : launch in 2 weeks with EIP7702 (set EOA
account code) EOF : targeting Pectra-devnet-4 in ~4 weeks EIP2537 BLS precompile : reprice gas costs based on benchmarks PeerDAS : plan to
rebase code from Dencun to Pectra but avoid testing other Pectra EIPs on PeerDAS devnets EIP7732 ePBS : no execution layer changes
required other than builder API, provides delayed execution validation, spec is stable & implementations have started Post-merge cleanup
proposals: Remove totalDifficulty from Execution API EIP7642 eth/69: drop pre-merge fields to reduce bandwidth
â€¢ Pectra (Prague + Electra) upgrade : Pectra-devnet-3 : launch in 2 weeks with EIP7702 (set EOA account code) EOF : targeting
Pectra-devnet-4 in ~4 weeks EIP2537 BLS precompile : reprice gas costs based on benchmarks PeerDAS : plan to rebase code from Dencun to
Pectra but avoid testing other Pectra EIPs on PeerDAS devnets
Pectra (Prague + Electra) upgrade :
â€¢ Pectra-devnet-3 : launch in 2 weeks with EIP7702 (set EOA account code)
Pectra-devnet-3 : launch in 2 weeks with EIP7702 (set EOA account code)
â€¢ EOF : targeting Pectra-devnet-4 in ~4 weeks
EOF : targeting Pectra-devnet-4 in ~4 weeks
â€¢ EIP2537 BLS precompile : reprice gas costs based on benchmarks
EIP2537 BLS precompile : reprice gas costs based on benchmarks
â€¢ PeerDAS : plan to rebase code from Dencun to Pectra but avoid testing other Pectra EIPs on PeerDAS devnets
PeerDAS : plan to rebase code from Dencun to Pectra but avoid testing other Pectra EIPs on PeerDAS devnets
â€¢ EIP7732 ePBS : no execution layer changes required other than builder API, provides delayed execution validation, spec is stable &
implementations have started
EIP7732 ePBS : no execution layer changes required other than builder API, provides delayed execution validation, spec is stable &
â€¢ Post-merge cleanup proposals: Remove totalDifficulty from Execution API EIP7642 eth/69: drop pre-merge fields to reduce bandwidth
Post-merge cleanup proposals:
â€¢ Remove totalDifficulty from Execution API
Remove totalDifficulty from Execution API
â€¢ EIP7642 eth/69: drop pre-merge fields to reduce bandwidth
EIP7642 eth/69: drop pre-merge fields to reduce bandwidth
Pectra (Prague + Electra) upgrade, likely targeting Q1 2025
â€¢ PeerDAS: PeerDAS breakout #7 : discussed moving to slot auctions to address free data availability problem in block auctions
â€¢ PeerDAS breakout #7 : discussed moving to slot auctions to address free data availability problem in block auctions
Osaka + F starname upgrade
â€¢ F-starname last call: suggestion to name consensus layer upgrade Fulu (current favorite) and combined upgrade Fosaka (Osaka + Fulu)
Centralization watch: threatening the value of your ETH
â€¢ ðŸš¨ Lido at 28.7% , still too close to 33.3% threshold
ðŸš¨ Lido at 28.7% , still too close to 33.3% threshold
â€¢ Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ): Execution layer: Geth ~55% majority Consensus layer: Prysm 36% Any client bug over 33.3%
could mean loss of finality
Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ):
â€¢ Execution layer: Geth ~55% majority
Execution layer: Geth ~55% majority
â€¢ Consensus layer: Prysm 36%
Consensus layer: Prysm 36%
â€¢ Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
â€¢ Better geographic diversity is optimal, particularly outside of North America & Europe
Better geographic diversity is optimal, particularly outside of North America & Europe
Layer 1
â€¢ Toni WahrstÃ¤tter: evolution of timing games , Kiln causes biggest problems
Toni WahrstÃ¤tter: evolution of timing games , Kiln causes biggest problems
â€¢ Lighthouse tree-states explainer, reduce RAM while keeping more beacon states in memory
Lighthouse tree-states explainer, reduce RAM while keeping more beacon states in memory
â€¢ Dora (explorer): add views of execution & consensus layer clients peer mesh
Dora (explorer): add views of execution & consensus layer clients peer mesh
Research
â€¢ Censorship insurance markets for BRAID : proposal to improve user experience issue of liquidity requirements
Client Releases
â€¢ Execution layer: EthereumJS v0.10.2 : RPC improvements Erigon v2.60.6 : improvements to stateDiff encoding, callTracer & diagnostics
Geth v1.14.8 : bug fixes Nethermind v1.28.0 : adds eth_simulate, enhances OP Stack support & tune Pruning.CacheMb Reth v1.0.5 : OP Granite
upgrade support
â€¢ EthereumJS v0.10.2 : RPC improvements
EthereumJS v0.10.2 : RPC improvements
â€¢ Erigon v2.60.6 : improvements to stateDiff encoding, callTracer & diagnostics
Erigon v2.60.6 : improvements to stateDiff encoding, callTracer & diagnostics
â€¢ Geth v1.14.8 : bug fixes
Geth v1.14.8 : bug fixes
â€¢ Nethermind v1.28.0 : adds eth_simulate, enhances OP Stack support & tune Pruning.CacheMb
Nethermind v1.28.0 : adds eth_simulate, enhances OP Stack support & tune Pruning.CacheMb
â€¢ Reth v1.0.5 : OP Granite upgrade support
Reth v1.0.5 : OP Granite upgrade support
Layer 2
â€¢ Optimism activated permissioned fallback until vulnerabilities from fault proof audits are fixed by Granite upgrade
EIPs/Standards
â€¢ EIPs (Ethereum improvement proposals): EIP7756 : EOF/EVM trace specification (adds EOF support to EIP3155 tracing)
EIPs (Ethereum improvement proposals):
â€¢ EIP7756 : EOF/EVM trace specification (adds EOF support to EIP3155 tracing)
â€¢ RIPs (Rollup improvement proposals): RIP7755 : Cross-L2-calls
RIPs (Rollup improvement proposals):
â€¢ RIP7755 : Cross-L2-calls
Stuff for developers
â€¢ Brock: intervals of memory/heap allocated values in Solidity
Brock: intervals of memory/heap allocated values in Solidity
â€¢ Bulloak toolchain (GitHub Action): check Solidity tests conform to Branching Tree Technique spec
Bulloak toolchain (GitHub Action): check Solidity tests conform to Branching Tree Technique spec
â€¢ Halmos v0.1.14 (symbolic testing): adds toml config, Docker image & forge-std assert cheatcode support
Halmos v0.1.14 (symbolic testing): adds toml config, Docker image & forge-std assert cheatcode support
â€¢ MACI v2 : adds concurrent polls and custom gatekeepers: Hats Protocol, Gitcoin Passport, Zupass & Semaphore Contribute to MACI v2
trusted setup ceremony
MACI v2 : adds concurrent polls and custom gatekeepers: Hats Protocol, Gitcoin Passport, Zupass & Semaphore
â€¢ Contribute to MACI v2 trusted setup ceremony
Ecosystem
â€¢ Eth Magicians call for contributions : new ideas, logo & moderators wanted
Eth Magicians call for contributions : new ideas, logo & moderators wanted
â€¢ EF data collection grant recipients share $560k
EF data collection grant recipients share $560k
Job Listings
â€¢ Sablier are hiring a Business Development Lead and Frontend Engineer
Job listings: $600 for 4 issues (75 char limit). Pay using 3cities. Questions? abcoathup at-gmail
Onchain stats
â€¢ Fees (via ultrasound.money ): Gas: 0.6 to 23.5 gwei, 2.5 gwei average; zero net issuance at 23.9 gwei 16k ETH net issuance this week
Fees (via ultrasound.money ):
â€¢ Gas: 0.6 to 23.5 gwei, 2.5 gwei average; zero net issuance at 23.9 gwei
Gas: 0.6 to 23.5 gwei, 2.5 gwei average; zero net issuance at 23.9 gwei
â€¢ 16k ETH net issuance this week
16k ETH net issuance this week
â€¢ ETHUSD : $2,534 - $2,752, currently $2,593, all time high $4,878
ETHUSD : $2,534 - $2,752, currently $2,593, all time high $4,878
â€¢ ETHBTC : currently 0.044 (Flippening at ~0.164)
ETHBTC : currently 0.044 (Flippening at ~0.164)
Notable at app layer
â€¢ Maker voted to offboard WBTC after BitGo announced plans for BiT Global (Justin Sun) to hold 2 of 3 multisig keys, due to the backlash
BitGo Singapore will now hold 3rd key Coinbase hinted at a future cbBTC
Maker voted to offboard WBTC after BitGo announced plans for BiT Global (Justin Sun) to hold 2 of 3 multisig keys, due to the backlash
BitGo Singapore will now hold 3rd key
â€¢ Coinbase hinted at a future cbBTC
â€¢ Accept USDC : campaign for small retailers to accept USDC payments
Accept USDC : campaign for small retailers to accept USDC payments
Regulation/business/tokens
â€¢ Thai SEC digital asset regulatory sandbox open for applications
Thai SEC digital asset regulatory sandbox open for applications
â€¢ CoinDesk: Eigen Labs sent employee addresses to EigenLayer projects for token airdrops
CoinDesk: Eigen Labs sent employee addresses to EigenLayer projects for token airdrops
General
â€¢ Alex Pertsev fundraiser for appeal to 5 year sentence
Alex Pertsev fundraiser for appeal to 5 year sentence
â€¢ ZachXBT: DPRK IT workers uncovered at 25+ projects
ZachXBT: DPRK IT workers uncovered at 25+ projects
â€¢ NIST post quantum encryption algorithms : ML-KEM, ML-DSA & SLH-DSA
NIST post quantum encryption algorithms : ML-KEM, ML-DSA & SLH-DSA
END OF SERVICE: plan to deprecate Week in Ethereum News
